blogPost.excerpt: Plasma.Finance is DeFi dashboard which aggregates the most popular DeFi protocols from different blockchains and allows users to manage their DeFi portfolio in one simple interface. You can trade and buy any ERC20 tokens with your Coinbase or Metamask wallet.
blogPost.body: Plasma.Finance is DeFi dashboard which aggregates the most popular DeFi protocols from different blockchains and allows users to manage their DeFi portfolio in one simple interface. You can trade and buy any ERC20 tokens with your Coinbase or Metamask wallet.
blogPost.title: Plasma Finance - The easiest way to invest in DeFi & manage crypto portfolio
blogPost.author: Ilia Maksimenka

localize.description: Plasma.Finance是DeFi仪表板，它聚合了来自不同区块链的最流行的DeFi协议，允许用户在一个简单的界面上管理他们的DeFi投资组合。您可以使用Coinbase或Metamask钱包交易和购买任何ERC20代币。
localize.tagline: 最简单的投资DeFi和管理加密投资组合的方法。

localize.description: Plasma.Finance是DeFi儀表板，它聚合了來自不同區塊鏈的最流行的DeFi協議，允許用戶在一個簡單的界面上管理他們的DeFi投資組合。您可以使用Coinbase或Metamask錢包交易和購買任何ERC20代幣。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的投資DeFi和管理加密投資組合的方法。

https://www.creative-tim.com/product/argon-dashboard-material-ui?ref=producthunt 是一個免費開源的React與Material-UI的管理模板，將幫助你創建驚人的網站。✔️ 100個手工製作的元素 ✔️ 4個自定義插件 ✔️ 6個示例頁面 現在就開始構建你的網絡應用吧！ ✔️ 100個手工製作的元素 ✔️ 4個自定義插件 ✔️ 6個示例頁面 現在就開始構建你的網絡應用吧。

next.excerpt: Card Curator is an app to help young professionals maximize their earnings from everyday spending and travel for free. Get personalized recommendations to help you automatically earn 5-10% or more on all your spending.

localize.description: 卡咖是一款帮助年轻职业人士在日常消费中实现收益最大化的应用，免费旅游。获得个性化推荐，帮你自动赚取所有消费的5%-10%甚至更多。
localize.tagline: 赢取信用卡奖励、积分和里程游戏
